36 
38 //
39 // Abstract class specifying generic control bounds. Examples include spheres,
40 // boxes, and cylinders.
41 //
43 
44 #ifndef FASTRACK_CONTROL_CONTROL_BOUND_H
45 #define FASTRACK_CONTROL_CONTROL_BOUND_H
46 
47 #include <fastrack/utils/types.h>
48 
49 namespace fastrack {
50 namespace control {
51 
52 template <typename C> class ControlBound {
53 public:
54  virtual ~ControlBound() {}
55 
56  // Derived classes must be able to check whether a query is inside the bound.
57  virtual bool Contains(const C &query) const = 0;
58 
59  // Derived classes must be able to compute the projection of a vector
60  // (represented as the templated type) onto the surface of the bound.
61  // NOTE: We will treat this vector as emanating from the natural origin
62  // of the bound so that it constitutes a meaningful direction with respect
63  // to that origin.
64  virtual C ProjectToSurface(const C &query) const = 0;
65 
66 protected:
67  explicit ControlBound() {}
68 }; //\class ControlBound
69 
70 } // namespace control
71 } // namespace fastrack
72 
73 #endif

virtual C ProjectToSurface(const C &query) const =0
